data.title: Texas Values
data.meta_description: Privacy opponents this week released their final report on why they feel Texas must allow boys into girls’ showers, restrooms, and locker rooms in schools and government buildings. Exactly one week after more than 90 percent of Texas Republican Primary voters approved a measure supporting the privacy and safety of women and children in government-owned […]
